topic.title: Personalize the interface
topic.shortdesc: Display preferences that can be set with default values and that users can change for their session are grouped in tab Personalization.

body.p: The section Personalization permits changes the general display preferences :

ul.li: The number of results to display per page search and listings can be defined. The value here not exceed the maximum set in the general options display.
Drop-down lists can be displayed either as a tree or flat.
CSV delimeter can be defined, either as a semicolon (;) or colon (,).
GLPI identifiers (ID) objects, hidden by default, can be displayed.
The number of associated elements visible to the selection of a tab can be activated. This allows to quickly determine the presence or absence of information related to the current object.
Display preferences related to location are configured here: date format, number format, display order of names, and language.
The number of results to display on the home page can also be defined.

body.p:
The section Assistance permits changes to the behavior of the support section :
Default values for new tickets (i.e. pre-selection of the user as a technician at creating a ticket) and request source
Choice of the display of new tickets
Automatic refresh of the list of tickets
Priority colors used in the interface
The section Software category permits the display of software categories. These can be displayed in full or folded in the form of a list of Categories of software.

The section Remote access key can regenerate the security key used to access private flows offered by GLPI. Current ICAL and WebCal planning flows are protected by this security key and is integrated into the url.
